desc: Effort or activity directed toward producing or accomplishing something.
example: She goes to work every day at 9 AM.

desc: A room or building where people work, especially at desks.
example: His office is on the third floor.

desc: An electronic device for storing and processing data.
example: I use a computer to write emails and create documents.

desc: A global network that connects computers around the world.
example: He found the recipe on the internet.

desc: A device used for talking to people over long distances.
example: She called her friend on the phone.

desc: A written or printed message addressed to someone.
example: He sent a letter to his grandparents.

desc: A planned piece of work with a specific goal.
example: They worked together on a school project.

desc: An event where people come together to discuss things.
example: The manager held a meeting with the team.

desc: A group of people working together toward a common goal.
A piece of written, printed, or electronic matter that provides information.
example: Please send me the document by email.
